Prasenjit wrote:

> Hi,
>     Are there any plans to have a distributed architecture, so that we
> can possibly run large number of toeThreads in different machines to
> acheive concurrency and more throughput ?

Yes. Its currently our highest priority. I'd point you at the wiki page 
that summarizes current outline thoughts on how we'd go about  this but 
the content seems to have gone missing (Check back in a day or two and 
the wiki should be revived).
Yours,
St.Ack
